      • checkResign

        public MoveResult checkResign(HantoPieceType pieceType,
                              Coordinate from,
                              Coordinate to)
        This function checks if the player would like to resign in this round or have to make a resign
        Parameters:
        pieceType - the type of piece making the move
        from - the source of the move
        to - the move target hex
        Returns:
        blue wins if red resigned rad wins if blue resigned null if no player resigned

      • checkMoveIsLegal

        protected void checkMoveIsLegal(HantoPieceType pieceType,
                                Coordinate from,
                                Coordinate to)
                         throws HantoException
        If this is a move, rather than placing a piece, it can only be the butterfly and it can only be one square. Otherwise, the move must be placing a piece.
